cars.name: Sedan
cars.description: Comfortably sleek and great for city use
key_aspects: Comfortable ride – especially for city and highway driving
Fuel efficiency – better than SUVs or trucks
Good trunk space – for everyday items or luggage
Lower center of gravity – provides better handling and stability

pros_cons.cons: Low ground clearance, not ideal for rough roads

cars.name: SUV
cars.description: Spacious and versatile, ideal for family trips and rough roads
key_aspects: High ground clearance – handles bumps and uneven roads
Ample cargo and passenger space – perfect for families
Powerful engine – suitable for towing or adventure
Available in 4WD – great for off-road driving

pros_cons.cons: Less fuel-efficient, harder to park in cities

cars.name: Hatchback
cars.description: Compact and practical for urban use
key_aspects: Easy to maneuver – great for tight parking spaces
Rear hatch opens wide – more loading convenience
Affordable – good choice for first-time buyers
Foldable back seats – expands storage space

pros_cons.cons: Less space than SUVs, limited rear-seat room

cars.name: Electric car
cars.description: Silent, smart, and sustainable — a modern driving experience.
key_aspects: Low running costs – no fuel, fewer moving parts
High-tech features – often comes with smart systems

pros_cons.cons: Charging stations may be limited, higher initial cost
